report.description: A list of weather for all samples.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savWDir ON savWDir.sample_id = s.id AND savWDir.sample_attribute_id = 152 AND savWDir.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWDir ON tltWDir.id = savWDir.int_value AND tltWDir.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWDir ON tWDir.id = tltWDir.term_id AND tWDir.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWDirX ON tltWDirX.meaning_id = tltWDir.meaning_id AND tltWDirX.preferred = FALSE AND tltWDirX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWDirX ON tWDirX.id = tltWDirX.term_id AND tWDirX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savWSpd ON savWSpd.sample_id = s.id AND savWSpd.sample_attribute_id = 153 AND savWSpd.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWSpd ON tltWSpd.id = savWSpd.int_value AND tltWSpd.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWSpd ON tWSpd.id = tltWSpd.term_id AND tWSpd.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWSpdX ON tltWSpdX.meaning_id = tltWSpd.meaning_id AND tltWSpdX.preferred = FALSE AND tltWSpdX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWSpdX ON tWSpdX.id = tltWSpdX.term_id AND tWSpdX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savWthr ON savWthr.sample_id = s.id AND savWthr.sample_attribute_id = 154 AND savWthr.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWthr ON tltWthr.id = savWthr.int_value AND tltWthr.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWthr ON tWthr.id = tltWthr.term_id AND tWthr.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltWthrX ON tltWthrX.meaning_id = tltWthr.meaning_id AND tltWthrX.preferred = FALSE AND tltWthrX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tWthrX ON tWthrX.id = tltWthrX.term_id AND tWthrX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savCloud ON savCloud.sample_id = s.id AND savCloud.sample_attribute_id = 155 AND savCloud.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltCloud ON tltCloud.id = savCloud.int_value AND tltCloud.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tCloud ON tCloud.id = tltCloud.term_id AND tCloud.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN termlists_terms tltCloudX ON tltCloudX.meaning_id = tltCloud.meaning_id AND tltCloudX.preferred = FALSE AND tltCloudX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN terms tCloudX ON tCloudX.id = tltCloudX.term_id AND tCloudX.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savMaxT ON savMaxT.sample_id = s.id AND savMaxT.sample_attribute_id = 156 AND savMaxT.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savMinT ON savMinT.sample_id = s.id AND savMinT.sample_attribute_id = 157 AND savMinT.deleted = FALSE #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.survey_id = 41 #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id AS id, tWDir.term AS wdir, tWDirX.term AS wdirx, tWSpd.term AS wspd, tWSpdX.term AS wspdx, tWthr.term AS wthr, tWthrX.term AS wthrx, tCloud.term AS cloud, tCloudX.term AS cloudx, savMaxT.int_value AS maxt, savMinT.int_value AS mint
